Stock

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stock.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for creating a store that will be used by the GUI The Store class holds the store name, total capital and has functions for accessing the capital and updating it.
    Author:
    Alex Holm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Store()
      Constructs a store object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String capitalToString()
      The store capital as a formatted string eg $100,000.00 or $40,000.00.
      double getCapital()
      The stores current capital.
      java.lang.String getStoreName()
      Returns the store name.
      void setCapital(double capital)
      Sets the stores capital to the passed in amount.
